content: @scottmcm @Josh Triplett pings for https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/65244

That's why I started the discussion I did, which I'd like to resolve before checking a box. As mentioned on the issue, I'm not treating any specific resolution direction as a blocker, but rather, I'm trying to confirm use cases and likely near-future directions for using the feature.
Makes sense-- do you have any outstanding concerns?
(and that doesn't rise to the level of a blocking concern, I just want to get an idea)
